segments.text: I would like to discuss purchasing a home with you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can help you . What location are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to live in Pasadena or Arcadia .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you thought about what your needs are in terms of size ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We would like a smaller cozy cottage with 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is living in a particular school district important to you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , we don â€™ t really care because they are all pretty good around here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you interested in purchasing on the lake , or would you like a home with a view ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We really want to live in a lakeside home with a dock for our boat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now that I have an idea of what you want , I can begin my search .
segments.speaker: S2
